files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. It provides a comprehensive suite of functions to perform various search and analysis operations on Quran data, including case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches, counting word and phrase occurrences, and calculating gematrical values.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses by iterating over the Quran data and checking if the search word is present. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive modes.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the Quran verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to perform case-sensitive search; defaults to False.
